alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:40PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Allen, Paulding and northwestern Van Wert Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 139 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Convoy, or 10 miles northwest of Van Wert, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Paulding around 155 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
